doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 48 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 11/24/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 48 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 11/24/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. President Reagan makes largest allocation yet for AIDS research in 19872. Tom Chorlton plans to resign from his post as head of the National Association of Gay and Lesbian Democratic Clubs3. Flight attendant with AIDS grounded due to possibility of spread through casual contactCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine4. Florida state Representative, Byron Combee resigns after being caught touching an undercover police officer in a lewd manner in a public park5. Chicago, "gay dollars" are in wide distribution, despite the efforts of certain banks to destroy the marked dollarsCOMMERCIAL: Stamp Out AIDS featuring Jennifer Bassey6. Sale of condoms has dramatically risen7. Part one of report on two new tests for AIDS infectionCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp8. Sports Report9. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine2. Review of "Nunsense" off-Broadway show, with clipsCOMMERCIAL: The Monster3. Interview with director, Phil ZwicklerCOMMERCIAL: The World of Video VHS store4. Coverage of the fundraising event, "22 on the Red"COMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation, with Jose Sarria5. Just Ask Raz advice segment
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 48 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 11/24/1986]: November 1986
